title: Did you Know: Pink Wards and the Minimap

embed.description: Found this by accident while playing the devil himself top. You can see where and which pink ward is yours on the minimap if you are trying to plant a new pink. ★Follow my stream: http://www.twitch.tv/maximum_spice ★Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/maxspiceplz ★Follow me on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MaximumSpice/

body:
Just found this out an hour or so ago. 

You can identify which pink ward is yours on the map if you already have one placed and try to place another just by hovering the mouse.

replies.poster: p e w d e k z
replies.body: Same thing with normal wards. If you place more than 3 it will have the X and the white on the map also.  {{item:3340}}

1:34 "Just a short quick video"
Here's how you get more subscribers and more likes on your videos. Firstly, you need to be must faster. You could've summarized this in 25 seconds with a clearer less boring explanation.

**"Hey Viewers! Maximum Spice here, did you know if you hover your cursor over either a Pink Ward, Warding Totem, Sightstone or Trackers Knife in your inventory you can see an indicator of which one will be deleted if you placed another? 

This only occurs if you have placed the maximum amount, 3/3. This X indicator (Show indicator) simply shows which one will disappear if you place another.
And of course, the same applies to Pink wards but only indicates one since you can only place one.

I hope you've learned something new and thanks for watching! On my next video I'll be doing a Twitch game play and guide. Cya next time!"**
